name: Headhunter
description: You can take trophies from monsters and non-humans using your witcher swords. Return them to villagers for rewards.

badges.text: Active ability, use %s while holding a witcher trophy and looking at a villager in close range.
Landing the killing blow with the correct witcher sword type while in possession of that mob's contract will guarantee their trophy to drop.
Information on which sword type to use, as well as more information on contracts, can be found in the Witcher's Journal.

Trophies can still drop naturally at a low chance without being a witcher or holding a contract. Trophies can be dismantled in a crafting table for less loot than the villagers would normally give you.
